title: jacky2022
author: jacky2022
content: Hey LEDU and Education Ecosystem family. We just created a Discord channel: https://discord.gg/cPfVh4QKzzJoin our Discord channel.Going forward we be using our Telegram Group, Twitter and Discord for project announcements. Telegram channel will be shut down."

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Do you mind giving us more information on what LEDU is all about? Have you created ann thread here, if yes do you mind giving here the link? If not, Maybe you can create an announcement thread at Announcements (Altcoins) to give us more information on what your project is all about. You can check existing announcement thread and maybe you can get idea on how to set up a good ann thread to present to possible investors, users or any target niche.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: joeperry on December 06, 2022, 03:13:20 PMDo you mind giving us more information on what LEDU is all about? Have you created ann thread here, if yes do you mind giving here the link? If not, Maybe you can create an announcement thread at Announcements (Altcoins) to give us more information on what your project is all about. You can check existing announcement thread and maybe you can get idea on how to set up a good ann thread to present to possible investors, users or any target niche.Ledu was a scam token. It has not paid murat bounty management after managing the campaign https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1167783I guess this is just another new account that being created by the people behind ledu scam token. Ledu was also getting negative trust as there was scam accusation that never be solved. There's also announcement thread of ledu scam token in the announcement section.
